> OOC: Opps, I thought it was already opened.

> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: I'll assume that Kenzo opened the pod.
> > 
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > The linght fell on a femenine body, she was tall and delicate. Her 
> > skin was silver and black. Her face was oval and delicate.Her lips 
> > thin and her nose was thin too. In the middle of her fore head was 
> a

> to 
> > woke up. She was using a feline-like helmet and her face was more 
> > human than feline.
> > 
> > Her body was like BW's Silverbolt but more delicate.
